Payment must be in US dollars only. Please be sure to have full payment and/or approved financing in place before making your final bid on eBay auction vehicles. Due to the difficulty of foreign currency/bank transactions, purchases from clients outside of the United States, must pay by wire transfer only. NO EXCEPTIONS. Please call us with any questions. Deposit The winning bidder is required to submit a $2,000 deposit which is due immediately following the close of the auction. This $2,000 deposit is good towards the purchase of the vehicle and will be deducted from the total amount of the purchase (unless otherwise requested). We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, AMEX), PAYPAL and/or personal checks for the initial deposit only. Our maximum deposit/partial payment by credit card is $2000. If the vehicle cannot be picked up or paid for completely within 7-days from the close of auction, a $2,000 NON-REFUNDABLE deposit is required to extend our hold period to 14 days, unless other arrangements are made beforehand (just keep us informed, were human, we recognize unforeseeable events). All deposits and fees collected are NON-REFUNDABLE in the event the vehicle is not paid for. Contact us for details. Balance of Payment Due The buyer agrees to pay remaining balance due (plus ALL applicable fees and taxes) within 7 days of the close of the auction. All financial transactions must be completed before delivery of the vehicle and the vehicle needs to be paid for in full. If the car is not paid for (or other arrangements are not made), we reserve the right to resell the vehicle seven days after the close of the eBay auction or receipt of deposit. While these instances are rare, LuxSport Motor Group, LLC guarantees that all vehicle titles are free and clear with no liens or liabilities on them. While we normally have all titles in our possession at the time of delivery, there are rare occasions where we may be waiting for them to arrive. Item.Description: --> Year: 2016 Mileage: 864 VIN: ZFF79ALAXG0217985 Primary color: Transmission type: 7-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission with manual override Engine: 8 Cylinder Engine 2016 Ferrari 488 GTB W/ Custom Carbon Fiber Mesha Design Body Kit - 864 Miles !! The Ferrari 488 GTB was introduced in 2015 to replace the previous 458 Italia. The 488 GTB was named "The Supercar of the Year 2015" by car magazine Top Gear, as well as becoming Motor Trend's 2017 "Best Driver's Car". Powered by a 3.9 Liter all-aluminum dry sump unit Turbocharged with two parallel ball-bearing twin-scroll turbochargers with air-to-air intercoolers and compressor wheels made of low-density TiAl alloy often used in jet engines to reduce inertia and resist high temperatures within the turbocharger. The engine produces 661 HP and 561 lbft of torque allowing a 0-60MPH sprint in a neck snapping 2.7 Seconds. To further enhance the body lines of this amazing machine, this 488 GTB has been outfitted with a Misha Design Carbon Fiber Body Kit. The Front Diffuser, Hood, Wide Body Fenders, Side Skirts, Rear Deck, Spoiler and Rear Diffuser are made entirely out of Carbon Fiber. The exposed matte Carbon adds an amzing contrast against the Ferrari Rosso Corsa making this 488 a real head turner. Tastefully lowered (original springs included as well) onto Savini SV-F2 Wheels with brand new Michilin Pilot Tires, this 488 has the perfect stance. With just over 800 miles, this 488 GTB is an incredible value and a true Italian Masterpiece. Great lease rates and Financing also available on any of our inventory! Buy Sell Trade Consignments Welcome! Please email concierge@fusionluxurymotors.com or call 1-818-773-8181 Dealer's Information 20837 Nordhoff St, Chatsworth, CA, 91311, US (818) 773-8181 concierge@fusionluxurymotors.com Contact Seller--> www.fusionluxurymotors.com View our other auctions Email to friend

Vehicle Description $358,747 MSRP! $66,870 Savings over the Window Sticker! One-Owner. Panoramic Roof. Satellite Navigation. Back-Up Camera. Heated Front Seats. Passenger Display. Apple Carplay. Carbon Fiber Steering Wheel + LEDs. Front Grill with Chromed Edges. Paddle Shifters. Engine StartStop Button. Power Folding Mirrors. Bluetooth. Satellite Radio. USB Adapter. Horse Stitched on Headrests. "Scuderia Ferrari" Shields. Nero Mats with Logo. Dual Climate. Power Seats with Memory. Bi-Xenon Headlights. Manettino on the Steering Wheel. Front and Rear Parking Sensors. 20 Inch Forged Painted Wheels. 680 Horsepower. The GTC4 Lusso: Four as in four-wheel drive. Four as in the four comfortable seats that cocoon driver and occupants alike. A four-seater that utterly changes the whole GT sports car concept, hailing nothing short of a revolution in the automotive world. This is the 2017 Ferrari GTC4Lusso! The Lusso is modern, innovative, futuristic and stunningly elegant: the perfect marriage of aerodynamic constraints and the rules of design. Dressed in stunning Bianco Avus over Cuoio leather seats, this 6.3L V12 produces an awe-inspiring 680 horsepower and 514 lb-ft of torque and comes ready for its next owner. It is future and history in one: the very best of the past is alive in the unique architecture and design of this four-seater, conceived to underscore the sporting stance of a car designed to tackle all weathers and all road surfaces. It may be a car that has elegance, beauty and art in its soul, but there's much, much more to the Lusso than sophisticated allure. With an MSRP of $358,747.00, this is your opportunity to acquire a Ferrari like no other for a fraction of the cost! About Toy Barn Cars Who is the Toy Barn of Dublin? "Born in a barn" in Dublin, were a family owned, full service pre-owned automobile Dealership serving Dublin, OH since 1998. The Toy Barn of Dublin offers premium high-line vehicle sales and service to our Dublin, OH area customers, not to mention all over the United States, as well as world-wide. From Italian exotic vehicles and luxury SUVs, to powerful American muscle and premium German performance sedans, we know anyone looking for a vehicle near Dublin, as well as all over the country, will likely find what they want at our dealership. We carry an eclectic mix of vehicles, making us a good choice as your Dublin car dealer. We offer one of the finest and most comprehensive inventories available in the Midwest, all hand-selected under a simple formula: it needs to be fun! We not only sell premium vehicles, but we also service all makes and models including German, American, Italian, Japanese, and much more, from performance/exotic to luxury/4-wheel-drive models. We offer auto financing to help our customers purchase the car of their dreams, and also can offer door to door shipping, both local and world-wide. Call us here at the Toy Barn of Dublin or come visit us in person. Were convenient to Dublin and located at 5100 Post Road and look forward to helping you purchase your new dream machine. Stunning! The F12 Berlinetta debuted at the 2012 Geneva Motor Show, and replaced the 599 grand tourer.The naturally aspirated 6.3 liter Ferrari V12 engine in the F12berlinetta has won the International Engine of the Year Awards 2013 in the Best Performance category and Best Engine above 4.0 liters. The F12berlinetta was named "The Supercar of the Year 2012" by car magazine Top Gear. The 6,262 cc (6.3 L; 382.1 cu in), naturally aspirated 65 V12 engine produces 730 HP at 8,250 RPM and 509 lbft of torque at 6,000 rpm. This allows the F12 to reach 0-62 MPH in 3.1 Seconds and 120 MPH in 8.5 Seconds with a top speed of 211 MPH. This Black Beauty is fitted with a tasteful, custom body kit that gives it a bit of an edge versus other F12's. Carbon Fiber is used for the front spoiler, side skirts, rear diffuser and decklid spoiler. With staggered wheels, the stance is perfect. With Just over 12K miles, this Italian Stallion is ready to prance! Great lease rates and Financing also available on any of our inventory! Buy Sell Trade Consignments Welcome! With a high emphasis on Contemporary Ultra Exotic & Vintage/Classic Cars, due to the extensive experience & passion of Yoel Wazana. In addition to the inventory that is owned by us, we also welcome vehicles on a consignment basis. Our extensive client portfolio allows Fusion Luxury Motors to place cars with anonymity, or give it the global exposure when needed. We operate with a core fundamental of establishing trust and long standing relationships with each of our clients. PROCUREMENT, TRADE-IN AND CONSIGNMENT The passion for vehicles is ever changing, and exiting a vehicle can be a dreaded step in the automobile industry. Fusion Luxury Motors’ established foundation with our clients allows us to help you navigate through the exit process while ensuring a seamless and headache free transition. This includes selling, trading-in, or consigning your vehicle to us. CUSTOMIZED VEHICLE SOURCING We welcome each of our clients’ uniqueness and understand that at times, the vehicle of their dreams needs to be located. Fusion Luxury Motors’ comprehensive experience and deeply rooted relationships within the Exotic and Vintage/Classic automobile industry allow us to locate the rarest and most obscure vehicles to meet your desires. We personally inspect each vehicle and allow you to proceed with confidence while never breaching the trust you place with us.
